citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately 1600
on 9/25/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on the door. No one answered. I
honked my car horn and located a facility employee. After speaking to the employee I made contact with the licensee by
phone. She was not readily available and no one authorized to do the inspection was available. Failure to provide access
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End of report.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately 1600 
on 9/25/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on the door. No one answered. I 
honked my car horn and located a facility employee. After speaking to the employee I made contact with the licensee by 
phone. She was not readily available and no one authorized to do the inspection was available. Failure to provide access 
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
End of report. 
 
 
End Section
